A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved the movie. Stuck to its roots. And was a film that relived the magic of Star Wars. Yes it took risks but it stuck to the lore that made Star Wars Star Wars. Be open minded and realize that surprises are necessary to continue enjoying these types of films. In my opinion\, it was in line with the Empire Strikes Back. Same tone\, humor\, pace\, darkness and surprises. Don't go into this movie with your own expectations and rules and you'll enjoy it as much as I did!
